refnamediv.refpurpose: Manage the settings of the player.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Manage the settings of player. Store settings in an ini-like configuration file.

refsect2.title: rc_set_init ()
refsect2.programlisting: void rc_set_init ();
refsect2.para: Initialize and load the settings of the player.

refsect2.title: rc_set_exit ()
refsect2.programlisting: void rc_set_exit ();
refsect2.para: Free the settings when exits.

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_string ()
refsect2.para: Returns the string value associated with key under group_name.

listitem.simpara: return location for a GError, or NULL
A newly allocated string or NULL if the specified key cannot be found.

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_integer ()
refsect2.para: Returns the value associated with key under group_name as an integer.

listitem.simpara: return location for a GError, or NULL
The value associated with the key as an integer, or 0 if the key was not found or could not be parsed.

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_double ()
refsect2.para: Returns the value associated with key under group_name as a double. If group_name is NULL, the start_group is used.

listitem.simpara: return location for a GError, or NULL
The value associated with the key as a double, or 0.0 if the key was not found or could not be parsed.

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Returns the value associated with key under group_name as a boolean.

listitem.simpara: return location for a GError, or NULL
The value associated with the key as a boolean, or FALSE if the key was not found or could not be parsed.

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_string_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: gchar ** rc_set_get_string_list (const gchar *group_name, const gchar *key, gsize *length, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Returns the values associated with key under group_name.

listitem.simpara: return location for the number of returned strings, or NULL
return location for a GError, or NULL
A NULL-terminated string array or NULL if the specified key cannot be found. The array should be freed with g_strfreev().

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_boolean_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean * rc_set_get_boolean_list (const gchar *group_name, const gchar *key, gsize *length, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Returns the values associated with key under group_name as booleans.

listitem.simpara: return location for a GError, or NULL
The values associated with the key as a list of booleans, or NULL if the key was not found or could not be parsed.

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_integer_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: gint * rc_set_get_integer_list (const gchar *group_name, const gchar *key, gsize *length, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Returns the values associated with key under group_name as integers.

listitem.simpara: return location for a GError, or NULL
The values associated with the key as a list of integers, or NULL if the key was not found or could not be parsed.

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_double_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: gdouble * rc_set_get_double_list (const gchar *group_name, const gchar *key, gsize *length, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Returns the values associated with key under group_name as doubles.

listitem.simpara: return location for a GError, or NULL
The values associated with the key as a list of doubles, or NULL if the key was not found or could not be parsed.

refsect2.title: rc_set_set_string ()
refsect2.para: Associates a new string value with key under group_name. If key cannot be found then it is created. If group_name cannot be found then it is created.

refsect2.title: rc_set_set_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Associates a new boolean value with key under group_name. If key cannot be found then it is created. If group_name cannot be found then it is created.

refsect2.title: rc_set_set_integer ()
refsect2.para: Associates a new integer value with key under group_name. If key cannot be found then it is created. If group_name cannot be found then it is created.

refsect2.title: rc_set_set_double ()
refsect2.para: Associates a list of string values for key under group_name. If key cannot be found then it is created. If group_name cannot be found then it is created.

listitem.simpara: number of string values in list

refsect2.title: rc_set_set_string_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: void rc_set_set_string_list (const gchar *group_name, const gchar *key, const gchar * const list[], gsize length);

refsect2.title: rc_set_set_boolean_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: void rc_set_set_boolean_list (const gchar *group_name, const gchar *key, gboolean list[], gsize length);
refsect2.para: Associates a list of boolean values with key under group_name. If key cannot be found then it is created. If group_name is NULL, the start_group is used.

listitem.simpara: number of string values in list

refsect2.title: rc_set_set_integer_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: void rc_set_set_integer_list (const gchar *group_name, const gchar *key, gint list[], gsize length);
refsect2.para: Associates a list of integer values with key under group_name. If key cannot be found then it is created. If group_name is NULL, the start_group is used.

listitem.simpara: number of integer values in list

refsect2.title: rc_set_set_double_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: void rc_set_set_double_list (const gchar *group_name, const gchar *key, gdouble list[], gsize length);
refsect2.para: Associates a list of double values with key under group_name. If key cannot be found then it is created. If group_name is NULL, the start_group is used.

listitem.simpara: number of double values in list

refsect2.title: rc_set_load_setting ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean rc_set_load_setting (const gchar *filename);
refsect2.para: Read configuration from given file.

listitem.simpara: Whether the configuration file is read.

refsect2.title: rc_set_save_setting ()
refsect2.programlisting: void rc_set_save_setting (const gchar *filename);
refsect2.para: Save configuration data to given file.

refsect2.title: rc_set_get_plugin_configure ()
refsect2.programlisting: GKeyFile * rc_set_get_plugin_configure ();
refsect2.para: Return the GKeyFile of plugin configuration.
